title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the HealthMetricsTracker app.

title: Design User Interface (UI)
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface of HealthMetricsTracker app.

title: Design Application Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the HealthMetricsTracker app's architecture, including backend and frontend components.

title: Develop Backend Components
description: Implement the backend components for HealthMetricsTracker app, including data storage, APIs, and authentication. Responsibilities include designing database schema, creating RESTful APIs, implementing user authentication, and ensuring secure data storage.

title: Develop Frontend Components
description: Implement the frontend components for HealthMetricsTracker app based on the UI design.

title: Integrate Backend and Frontend
description: Combine the implemented backend and frontend components to create a functional HealthMetricsTracker app.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Tests
description: Test individual components and the overall functionality of HealthMetricsTracker app, focusing on both unit tests for individual functionalities and integration tests to ensure seamless interaction between different modules.

title: Address Test Findings
description: Fix any issues found during unit and integration testing.

title: Prepare App for Deployment
description: Package and prepare HealthMetricsTracker app for deployment to the app stores. This task includes creating the final builds (Android and iOS), checking for any last-minute bugs, ensuring all features are functioning correctly, and submitting the app to Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

title: Deploy HealthMetricsTracker App
description: Prepare the packaged app for deployment and upload it to the respective app stores for release.

title: Gather User Feedback
description: Collect user feedback on the released HealthMetricsTracker app to identify areas for improvement. Implement a survey system within the app for easy and structured feedback collection.
